item.description:
The Center of Light presents Master Teacher Father Peter Bowes

Have you ever had a powerful-feeling dream and felt that there must be some message in it, if you could only decipher what it means? Your soul is trying to speak to you through your dreams. You need to understand the symbolism in dreams, so you can begin to unravel the mystery of their meaning. Father Peter Bowes, an expert in Jungian dream interpretation, will help you discover the hidden wisdom of your dreams. Bring a dream or two to share and unlock this great secret of learning from within.

Bring a friend for free!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Dream Interpretation Workshop - Seminar with a Master Teacher
